metadata.name: My Deep Imagination
metadata.description:
My love for art is deep. 

Thanks to the new nft space I can show my art to the world from my room. 

Itâ€™s a long time to be laughed at. Since from being a child and called weirdo and all those. Itâ€™s not my fault I couldnâ€™t spend a day without drawing or creating art from imaginations. It usually is like some one is asking me to do exactly what I do because only after finishing my art do I look at what has been done. 

All my pain and thoughts go deep. I will post everything I every created. Some are private thought because they have some special meaning and attached feelings. I will show some sometime.

I believe to find some lovers of my deep imagination art works on this space
